    <PropertyValue>// **************************************************
// Custom code for CreateOrderWizardForm
// Created: 6/3/2018 3:45:34 PM
// **************************************************

extern alias Erp_Contracts_BO_SalesOrder;
extern alias Erp_Contracts_BO_OrderDtlSearch;
extern alias Erp_Adapters_SalesOrder;
extern alias Erp_Adapters_Quote;


extern alias Erp_Contracts_BO_QuoteDtlSearch;
extern alias Erp_Contracts_BO_Quote;
extern alias Erp_Contracts_BO_Customer;
extern alias Erp_Contracts_BO_AlternatePart;
extern alias Erp_Contracts_BO_Part;
extern alias Erp_Contracts_BO_Vendor;
extern alias Erp_Contracts_BO_VendorPPSearch;
extern alias Erp_Contracts_BO_ShipTo;

using System;
using System.ComponentModel;
using System.Data;
using System.Diagnostics;
using System.Windows.Forms;
using Erp.Adapters;
using Erp.UI;
using Ice.Lib;
using Ice.Adapters;
using Ice.Lib.Customization;
using Ice.Lib.ExtendedProps;
using Ice.Lib.Framework;
using Ice.Lib.Searches;
using Ice.UI.FormFunctions;

public class Script
{
	// ** Wizard Insert Location - Do Not Remove 'Begin/End Wizard Added Module Level Variables' Comments! **
	// Begin Wizard Added Module Level Variables **

	private EpiDataView edvQuoteHed;
	private EpiDataView edvOrderHed;
	private EpiDataView edvRelSalesOrder;
	private EpiDataView edvQuoteDtl;
	private EpiDataView edvOrderDtl;
	private DataView OrderDtl_DataView;
	private EpiBaseAdapter oTrans_taskSetAdapter;
	// End Wizard Added Module Level Variables **
    int ChangeCount=0;
    private int QuoteNum = 0; 
    private int OrderNum = 0; 
	// Add Custom Module Level Variables Here **
     bool  CheckBox01 ;
	 int LineNum;
     string  ShortChar01;
     string  ShortChar02;
     string  ShortChar03;
 	string  ShortChar04 ;
 	string  ShortChar05 ;
     string  ShortChar06;
	public void InitializeCustomCode()
	{
		// ** Wizard Insert Location - Do not delete 'Begin/End Wizard Added Variable Initialization' lines **
		// Begin Wizard Added Variable Initialization


		this.edvQuoteDtl = ((EpiDataView)(this.oTrans.EpiDataViews["QuoteDtl"]));
		//this.edvQuoteDtl.EpiViewNotification += new EpiViewNotification(this.edvQuoteDtl_EpiViewNotification);
		this.edvOrderDtl = ((EpiDataView)(this.oTrans.EpiDataViews["OrderDtl"]));
	
		this.OrderDtl_DataView = this.OrderDtl_Row.dataView;
		this.OrderDtl_DataView.ListChanged += new ListChangedEventHandler(this.OrderDtl_DataView_ListChanged);
		this.oTrans_taskSetAdapter = ((EpiBaseAdapter)(this.csm.TransAdaptersHT["oTrans_taskSetAdapter"]));
		this.oTrans_taskSetAdapter.AfterAdapterMethod += new AfterAdapterMethod(this.oTrans_taskSetAdapter_AfterAdapterMethod);
		// End Wizard Added Variable Initialization

		// Begin Wizard Added Custom Method Calls

		// End Wizard Added Custom Method Calls
	}

	public void DestroyCustomCode()
	{
		// ** Wizard Insert Location - Do not delete 'Begin/End Wizard Added Object Disposal' lines **
		// Begin Wizard Added Object Disposal

		//this.edvQuoteDtl.EpiViewNotification -= new EpiViewNotification(this.edvQuoteDtl_EpiViewNotification);
		this.edvQuoteDtl = null;
		
		this.edvOrderDtl = null;

		this.OrderDtl_DataView.ListChanged -= new ListChangedEventHandler(this.OrderDtl_DataView_ListChanged);
		this.OrderDtl_DataView = null;
		this.oTrans_taskSetAdapter.AfterAdapterMethod -= new AfterAdapterMethod(this.oTrans_taskSetAdapter_AfterAdapterMethod);
		this.oTrans_taskSetAdapter = null;
		// End Wizard Added Object Disposal

		// Begin Custom Code Disposal

		// End Custom Code Disposal
	}


	

	//check if Quote has an Order 
     private int QryCheckforOrder(int QuoteNum)
      {
         try
           {
                       
             DynamicQueryAdapter adapterDynamicQuery = new DynamicQueryAdapter(this.oTrans);
             adapterDynamicQuery.BOConnect();
            
            int Quote_Check = 0;   
            string QuoteNo = QuoteNum.ToString();
             string BAQName = "QuoteOrderChk";
             Ice.BO.QueryExecutionDataSet ds = new Ice.BO.QueryExecutionDataSet();
 
             ds.ExecutionParameter.AddExecutionParameterRow("QuoteNum", QuoteNo, "int", false, Guid.Empty, "A");
                                                
            int minAccountLevel = int.MaxValue; 
            int maxAccountLevel = int.MinValue; 
            // Call Adapter method
             adapterDynamicQuery.ExecuteByID(BAQName, ds);
 
            
             if (adapterDynamicQuery.QueryResults.Tables["Results"].Rows.Count > 0)
                    {

                     foreach (DataRow dr in adapterDynamicQuery.QueryResults.Tables["Results"].Rows)
                            {
                               int accountLevel = Convert.ToInt32(dr["OrderDtl_OrderNum"]); 
                                 minAccountLevel = Math.Min(minAccountLevel, accountLevel); 
                                  maxAccountLevel = Math.Max(maxAccountLevel, accountLevel); 
                                
                                    }

                     }
               Quote_Check = maxAccountLevel ;
                adapterDynamicQuery.Dispose();
 
            return Quote_Check ;
 
           } catch (System.Exception ex)
           {
           ExceptionBox.Show(ex);
               return 0;
           }
       }
 



	private void OrderDtl_DataView_ListChanged(object sender, ListChangedEventArgs args)
	{

		// Add Event Handler Code

    
	
  
	}

	private void CallSalesOrderAdapterGetDataMethod(int OrderNum, int QuoteNum)
	{
		try
		{
	

            QuoteAdapter adapterQuote = new QuoteAdapter(this.oTrans);
			adapterQuote.BOConnect();

                

			SalesOrderAdapter adapterSalesOrder = new SalesOrderAdapter(this.oTrans);
			adapterSalesOrder.BOConnect();
           
              System.Data.DataSet dsSalesOrder = adapterSalesOrder.GetData(OrderNum);
					
			   if (dsSalesOrder != null)
			       {
                   System.Data.DataSet dsQuote = adapterQuote.GetData(QuoteNum);

			            if (dsQuote != null)
			             {
			                 foreach (DataRow dr in dsQuote.Tables["QuoteDtl"].Rows)
					              {             
                            
                              LineNum = Convert.ToInt32(dr["QuoteLine"]);
                              CheckBox01 = Convert.ToBoolean(dr["CheckBox01"]);
						      ShortChar01 = dr["ShortChar01"].ToString();
                              ShortChar02 = dr["ShortChar02"].ToString();
                              ShortChar03 = dr["ShortChar03"].ToString();
							  ShortChar04 = dr["ShortChar04"].ToString();
							  ShortChar05 = dr["ShortChar05"].ToString();
						      ShortChar06 = dr["ShortChar06"].ToString();

                           
                          


					
					            foreach (DataRow item in dsSalesOrder.Tables["OrderDtl"].Rows)
					               { 
			                                
                                 if( Convert.ToInt32(item["OrderLine"]) == LineNum)
                                      {
                                       
					                   item.BeginEdit(); 
						               item["CheckBox01"] = CheckBox01;
						               item["ShortChar01"] = ShortChar01;
                                       item["ShortChar02"] = ShortChar02;
                                       
									    item["ShortChar03"] = ShortChar03;
									    item["ShortChar04"] = ShortChar04;
									    item["ShortChar05"] = ShortChar05;
									    item["ShortChar06"] = ShortChar06;
						               item["RowMod"] = "U";
					                   item.EndEdit();
					                   adapterSalesOrder.Update();
                                      }
		                          
                                  }
		                      }
		           
		                  }
                     }
									adapterSalesOrder.Dispose();
                  adapterQuote.Dispose();


		} catch (System.Exception ex)
		{
			ExceptionBox.Show(ex);
		}
	}

	

	private void oTrans_taskSetAdapter_AfterAdapterMethod(object sender, AfterAdapterMethodArgs args)
	{
		
		switch (args.MethodName)
		{
			case "GetByID":
               QuoteNum = Convert.ToInt32(OrderDtl_DataView[0]["QuoteNum"]);
		  

         ChangeCount = ChangeCount + 1;
         
       
            OrderNum = QryCheckforOrder(QuoteNum) ;
         
               
               if(OrderNum > 0){
                
                  CallSalesOrderAdapterGetDataMethod(OrderNum, QuoteNum);
                     }
            
				break;
		}

	}
}


</PropertyValue>
